Terms and Conditions

Welcome to Aadhunik Technologies! We’re thrilled to have you here. Please take a moment to read through our terms and conditions, as they outline the rules and regulations for using our website and services. By accessing or using our website, you are agreeing to these terms in full. If you don’t agree with any part of these terms, please don’t use our website.

Acceptance of Terms and Conditions

The general Terms and Conditions of Sale outlined here govern the contractual relationship between you, the ‘User’ (also referred to as ‘You’ or the ‘Customer’), and us, the ‘Company’ (referred to as ‘We’ or the ‘Website’), owned by AADHUNIK TECHNOLOGIES, with the GST number 24DNBPK7130J1Z4. By using our services and confirming your order, you acknowledge and accept these Conditions without reservation. These terms are the only conditions applicable and substitute all others, except in cases of express written dispensation. By confirming your order, you acknowledge that you have read and unreservedly accepted our General Conditions of Sale. These Terms and Conditions of Sale are important to you and Aadhunik Technologies as they protect your rights as a valued customer and our rights as a business.

Intellectual Property Ownership

We work hard to create and share valuable content. Unless stated otherwise, Aadhunik Technologies and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on this website. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may view and print pages for your personal use, but please respect the following restrictions:

  • Do not republish material from this website without our permission.
  • Do not sell, rent, or sub-license material from this website.
  • Do not reproduce, duplicate, or copy material from this website.
  • Do not redistribute content unless the content is specifically made for redistribution.
Acceptable Use

We want our website experience to be safe and enjoyable for everyone. Please don’t use our site in any way that causes damage or impairs its availability or accessibility. Additionally, don’t use our site for any unlawful, harmful, or fraudulent activities.

Specifically, please don’t:

  • Use our site to distribute any harmful software like viruses or spyware.
  • Engage in any activity that disrupts our website or the experience of other users.
Limitations of Liability

While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, Aadhunik Technologies will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from the use of this website. This includes:

  • Direct, indirect, special, or consequential loss.
  • Any business losses, loss of revenue, income, profits, or anticipated savings.
  • Loss of contracts, business relationships, reputation, or data.

These limitations apply even if we have been advised of the potential for such losses.

Accuracy of Information

We do our best to ensure that all information on our website is accurate and current. However, we can’t guarantee that everything will always be completely up-to-date or free of errors. Please use the information on our site as a general guide, and verify any critical details directly with us.

Changes to the Terms

We may update these terms from time to time to reflect changes in our services or policies. We encourage you to review our terms regularly to stay informed about any updates. Your continued use of our website after any changes means you accept the new terms.

Governing Law

These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of INDIA. By using our website, you agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in this location.

Contact Information

We’re here to help! If you have any questions or concerns about these, please reach out to us:

Call Us:

  • Sales & Enquiry: +91-6355-829590

Factory address:

  • Shop no-16 savan Plazza.savaliya circle.yogi chowk.nana varachha.Surat

Thank you for visiting Aadhunik Technologies! We appreciate you and your business and look forward to serving you with the best.
